gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 121, Spurs 106
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeated the Spurs, 121-106.  Jonas Valanciunas led the way with 24 points, 12 rebounds and two blocks for the Pelicans, while Trey Murphy III added 18 points and four 3PM in his season debut.  Devin Vassell tallied 14 points for the Spurs in the losing effort.  The Pelicans improve to 11-9 on the season, while the Spurs fall to 3-16.
